frameDefinitions: Under some Condition, usually left implicit, a Responsible_party is required to perform some Duty.
An Agent wants to achieve a Goal,  or an object.
An Emitter emits a Beam of light from a Source, along a Path, and/or towards a Goal.
A stretch of linguistic discourse or a Text that a Communicator produces has a Topic that it is about.
An Agent adjusts an Instrument to enable it to interact directly with a difficult-to-access Target_location.
An Agent makes use of a Means (either an action or a (system of) entities standing in for the action) in order to achieve a Purpose.
frameExamples: It is my <t>duty</t> to fight any attack on the Brotherhood .
The modest American <t>goal</t> of a threefold increase in capacity recognises this fact .
Avoid allowing light to <t>shine</t> into neighbors' gardens.
If you <t>aim</t> your weapons somewhere else , I 'll be more likely to talk .
The primary <t>means</t> of gas detection is mass spectroscopy .
listRoleDefinitions: The person who must perform the <fen>Duty</fen>.
The action that the <fen>Responsible_party</fen> is obligated to perform.
The time interval during which the Responsibly_party is obligated to fulfill the Duty.
A location in which the <fen>Responsible_party</fen> has a specified <fen>Duty</fen> .
The volitional actor who intends to achieve a goal.
The action or state of affairs that the Agent wants to achieve.
A <fen>Means</fen> is an object or action that is used or designed to achieve a particular <fen>Goal</fen>.
This role marks expressions that indicate an <fen>Attribute</fen> for which it is the <fen>Agent</fen>'s goal that it have or reach a particular <fen>Value</fen> .
This role marks expressions that indicate which <fen>Value</fen> the <fen>Agent</fen> wants the <fen>Attribute</fen> to reach.
This Frame Element expresses a time period during which an <fen>Agent</fen> had a particular <fen>Goal</fen>.
This role identifies the entity at the <fen>Source</fen> from which the <fen>Beam</fen> originates.
The <fen>Source</fen> is the location the <fen>Beam</fen> occupies initially before its change of location.
The light that travels from a <fen>Source</fen> along a <fen>Path</fen> to a <fen>Goal</fen>.
<fen>Path</fen> refers to where the <fen>Beam</fen> travels over or to a landmark the <fen>Beam</fen> travels by.
<fen>Goal</fen> is the location the <fen>Beam</fen> ends up in.
The <fen>Topic</fen> is what a <fen>Text</fen> is about.
A set of propositions that is coherent in being about a <fen>Topic</fen>
The <fen>Communicator</fen> is the person who has produced a <fen>Text</fen> on a <fen>Topic</fen>.
The time at which the <fen>Communicator</fen> produces <fen>Text</fen> on a <fen>Topic</fen>.
The individual that manipulates the <fen>Instrument</fen> to enable interaction with the <fen>Targeted</fen>.
The <fen>Targeted</fen> is the entity located in an indirectly accessible location relative to the <fen>Agent</fen>.
The object manipulated by the <fen>Agent</fen> in order to interact with the <fen>Targeted</fen>.
The location that the <fen>Agent</fen> wishes to ready the <fen>Instrument</fen> to access.
The <fen>Activity</fen> is undertaken by the <fen>Agent</fen> and is directed towards the <fen>Targeted</fen> or <fen>Target_location</fen>.
This role identifies the <fen>Time</fen> when the <fen>Agent</fen> takes aim.
The place where the <fen>Agent</fen> aims at the <fen>Targeted</fen>.
The Agent uses the Means to acheive a Purpose.
The action performed by the Agent.
The goal or purpose of the Agent.
The <fen>Time</fen> when the <fen>Agent</fen> uses the <fen>Means</fen>.
listRoleExamples: My job is <fex>to get to the other side of the bridge</fex>.
<fex>At that time</fex> men were obligated to marry women from their own community.
I almost forgot to tell you that <fex>in Sweden</fex> we are obligated to spend atleast 7.5 months in the army for training.
<fex>Microsoft 's</fex> goal of delivering a million copies in the first year is trifling compared to the 25 million copies of Windows it has shipped since May 1990.
The company missed its goal <fex>of getting a thousand third-party software packages shipped</fex>.
The goal <fex>of treatment</fex> was to lower diastolic blood pressure below 85 mm  Hg .
We exceeded our <fex>production</fex> target of 2000 units
GM has a production target <fex>of 2,000,000 units</fex>
But the main goal <fex>of the 1990s</fex> could be to transform a big , heavily armed standing army into a more flexible force
<fex>Sunlight</fex> gleamed from the water of the bay.
In his book, <fex>Smithers</fex> discusses cotton production.
I tried to target <fex>his left thigh</fex> .
If you target <fex>towards the bridge</fex> , make sure to avoid the church .
<fex>The attack</fex> targeted a village south of here.

sourceCandidateSpans.text: the Frederick S. Pardee School of Global Studies
the School of Management the Questrom School of Business
the Aaron and Candy Spelling Scholarships
